title: Cush Drive Metalastic Bushes - Inspection

body.body: Metalastic bushes must always be replaced as a complete set.
Check all cush drive metalastic bushes for:
Damage, pitting and cracks. Replace as necessary.
Check for splits. Replace as necessary.
Check the cush drive outer for wear and damage. Replace as necessary.
Check the cush drive carrier for wear and damage. Replace if necessary.
Check the plastic sleeves for splits, cracks, wear and damage. Replace if necessary
